column2:
"Ooh, nice killing out there. Oh, and I
saw your report. A blood-soaked thing of
beauty it was!"

"You really used that gunslash perfectly
in each situation."

"Anyway, that gunslash seems to fit your hands
like a glove, so why don't you just keep it?"

"Keep up the good work with your gunslash.
And make sure to torment lots and lots of
hostiles before you kill them, okay?"
"You can now invite Lisa to join you as a partner."

"Joseph has issued a client order.

You can find him in the upper gate area."
